entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, St. Anthony
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:08 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches in onshore winds overnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 11:16 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches in onshore winds. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:16 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Showers ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Fog patches in onshore winds in the evening and after midnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:16 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023
